text: Kamaghɨn amizɨma e nɨghnɨzir gavgavimra Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazibar akabar iti. Ezɨ ia uaghan men akabar suiragh gavgavigh, egh deragham. Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazibar akaba mati lam mɨtatemɨn ikia isi. Egha ghua Kraisɨn angazangarim ian navir averiabar aven ikia isi, mati amɨnim itir mɨkovezim overiamɨn ikia isima mɨtatem zuima angazangarim oto.(1:19) Mɨzarazimɨn mɨkovezir kam, kar Krais Iesus. Nɨ gansɨ Akar Mogomem 22.16ɨn gan.
